review: Great/Cheap way to get Netflix on to your TV. A very great purchase for the Pandora app as well.
author: James Fox

review: Love my ChromeCast.  Much nicer picture on the tv than my monitor.  Works great for most everything.  Only thing i wish that it could do is cast something not in a browser (like files from my computer).
author: Zach "I am a huge Dresden Files fan."

review: Had the Chromecast running for two days and I can say without a doubt that this is the best 35 bucks I've spent in a long time. I love this device and the way it just enhances the apps I already had installed on my iPhone. Installation is super simple and using it is a breeze. If your thinking of getting one, just go ahead and do it. You won't regret it.
author: Brian Reese

review: It can't project every thing, just youtube and a few others.
author: Linlin Li

review: Good product. Part of cutting the cord.
author: Pastor GR

review: The item arrived used, this was not a new product. This can be confirmed with the lack of original packaging, there was a used band-aid inside of the box that this came in, and the device was trying to search for its previous owner's WIFI Network.
author: Benjamin Perkins

review: I love this thing. It helps me get my work done at home by giving me a big screen to review my work! It's great!
author: G. Gerard "onceaneducator"

review: Had another chromecast but my daughter took it to her room, so this is our second. Wonderful tech does exactly what it's supposed to for a great price.
author: Amazon Customer

review: is wonderful but i need to learn more, but you can see a lot of movies there
author: Amazon Customer
